scripts.build: pnpm --filter @dungeon-crawler/shared build && pnpm --filter @dungeon-crawler/api build && pnpm --filter @dungeon-crawler/ui build
scripts.verify: pnpm format && pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint && pnpm test
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @dungeon-crawler/shared test && pnpm --filter @dungeon-crawler/api test && pnpm --filter @dungeon-crawler/ui test
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm --filter @dungeon-crawler/shared test:coverage && pnpm --filter @dungeon-crawler/api test:coverage && pnpm --filter @dungeon-crawler/ui test:coverage
